Description: Fragment from rim and neck of North Ionian black-figured krater; inside glazed with broad red band lined in white; maeanber frieze on top of rim; exterior, top left of neck panel preserved, beside glazed handle zone; head of bull to right with redf shoulder.
Bibliographic references: Vase / Catalogue of Vases in the British Museum (B103.6)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.311)
